name: SQUIDS SHARKS AND BOXES
description:
Hello world,  this is my first full developed title called "Squids,Sharks And Boxes". In this game you have to swim and blow some sharks and boxes to score and save your beach house, but be careful some boxes can explode!

Play the game on PC, MacOS or Android for free.

CONTROLS PCMOBILEACTIONarrowstouch digipad
move your squid
returntouch pause bubble
pause the game
FOLLOW ME instagram.com/squaremonkeygames/ https://twitter.com/squaremonkey2 Have fun and thank you!
